title: Statement by NSC Spokesperson Ned Price on the Explosion in Thailand | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
August 17, 2015

 



Statement by NSC Spokesperson Ned Price on the Explosion in Thailand





	The United States extends our deepest condolences to all of those affected by the explosion in Bangkok, Thailand. The United States condemns this deplorable act of violence, and our thoughts are with the victims, their families and loved ones, and the Thai emergency personnel responding to the incident.Â  The United States will remain in close contact with the Thai authorities as they investigate this attack.
